lead_paragraph: A Kuwaiti sheikh who is a major powerbroker in the Olympics and world soccer has been acquitted by an appeals court of violating a gag order in a case about an alleged coup, his lawyer said Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Olympic Powerbroker Has Kuwaiti Court Conviction Thrown Out
headline.main: Olympic Powerbroker Has Kuwaiti Court Conviction Thrown Out

snippet: A Kuwaiti sheikh who is a major powerbroker in the Olympics and world soccer has been acquitted by an appeals court of violating a gag order in a case about an alleged coup, his lawyer said Tuesday....
